title: Mystery Symptom
description: You're experiencing an unusual symptom that's concerning. Time to figure out what's going on.
responses: Schedule a doctor's appointment
Research it first (carefully!)
Talk to your partner about your concerns

title: Energy Surge
description: You wake up feeling incredibly energized and healthy. Your body is firing on all cylinders!
responses: Use this energy for something active
Tackle your to-do list with enthusiasm
Share the good vibes with others

title: Burnout Warning
description: Your body is sending signals: fatigue, irritability, poor sleep. You're running on fumes.
responses: Take immediate steps to rest and recover
Reassess your commitments and boundaries
Talk to your partner about supporting you through this

title: Fitness Milestone
description: You achieve a personal fitness goal or notice you're genuinely getting stronger/healthier!
responses: Celebrate this achievement
Set a new goal to work toward
Inspire your partner to join you

title: Mental Health Dip
description: You're struggling with anxiety, depression, or just feeling off. Your mental health needs attention.
responses: Reach out for professional support
Be honest with your partner about what you're experiencing
Practice self-compassion and take it one day at a time

title: Injury
description: You injure yourself - maybe while exercising, doing chores, or just through bad luck. It's going to slow you down.
responses: Follow proper recovery protocols
Accept help from your partner
Find ways to stay positive during recovery

title: Sleep Breakthrough
description: After struggling with sleep, you finally get a solid night's rest. Everything feels clearer.
responses: Protect this sleep routine
Notice how much better you feel
Make sleep a priority going forward

title: Stress Manifestation
description: Stress is showing up physically - headaches, stomach issues, tension. Your body is telling you something.
responses: Address the root cause of the stress
Try stress-management techniques
Talk to your partner about what's weighing on you

title: Chronic Condition Flare
description: If you have a chronic condition, it's flaring up. If not, an old injury is acting up again.
responses: Manage it with your established strategies
Adjust your expectations and pace
Let your partner help and support you

title: Wellness Groove
description: Everything is clicking: good sleep, healthy eating, regular movement, mental clarity. You're in a great health rhythm!
responses: Maintain this beautiful balance
Share your wellness approach with others
Feel grateful for your body and mind
